trans-unit.source: Specifies whether a column type is visible in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> designer.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否在中可见列类型<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>设计器。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: By default, types derived from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> appear in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control-specific parts of the Visual Studio designer, but inherit a <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute> of <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute.No> to prevent them from appearing in other parts of the designer.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，类型派生自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>出现在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>特定于控件的组成部分 Visual Studio 设计器中，但是它继承<xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute>的<xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute.No>以防止它们显示在设计器的其他部分中。</xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute.No> </xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: This is necessary because the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> type implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> interface, which normally makes an instance of the type appear in the designer.
trans-unit.target: 这是必需的因为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>类型实现<xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>接口，它通常使设计器中的显示类型的实例。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: Use this attribute to prevent a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> type from appearing in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control-specific designer.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性可防止<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>类型出现在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>特定于控件的设计器。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关使用属性的详细信息，请参阅[属性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute"></xref> class using the default <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible*> property value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute"></xref>类使用默认<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible*>属性值<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute"></xref> class using the specified value to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible*> property.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute"></xref>类使用指定的值来初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible*>

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible*> property.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible*>

trans-unit.source: The default <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute"></xref> value, which is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Yes"></xref>, indicating that the column is visible in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> designer.
trans-unit.target: 默认值<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute"></xref>值，该值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Yes"> </xref>，，该值指示列是否显示在<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>设计器。

trans-unit.source: This attribute instance has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible%2A> property value of `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性实例具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible%2A>属性值`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this object is equivalent to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示此对象是否等于指定的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to compare with the current <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>要与当前<xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object>进行比较</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the specified object is a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute"></xref> instance with the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible*> property value as this instance; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>指示指定的对象是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute"></xref>具有相同的实例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible*>属性值与此实例; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible*>

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 返回此实例的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: 32 位有符号的整数哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this attribute instance is equal to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Default"></xref> attribute value.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示此属性实例是否等于<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Default"></xref>属性值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that this instance is equal to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Default"></xref> instance; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要指示此实例是否等于<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Default"></xref>实例; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute"></xref> value indicating that the column is not visible in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> designer.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute"> </xref>值，该值指示的列不显示在<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>设计器。

trans-unit.source: This attribute instance has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible%2A> property value of `false`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性实例具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible%2A>属性值`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDesignTimeVisibleAttribute"> </xref>值，该值指示列是否显示在<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>设计器。
